Teach preschool kids to write ABC in tracing game Learn Alphabets Games for Kids

 Whats is “Dono Words - Learn Alphabets Games for Kids”

Learn ABC was created to be a fun and free alternative to conventional, improving their memories and uninspiring methods of learning how to write the alphabet.
In the transition to preschool, our free innovative and educational app will teach your Child how to recognize and write the letters of the alphabet.

Why this ABC for Kids Tracing game?

With bright colors and interactive elements, This learn ABC game helps to keep your child curious and with a hunger to learn.

Prepare your child for upcoming education from ages 4-6. We know your struggle finding games for toddlers where they can play and learn abcd. This is your app to teach abc for kids.

Best Tracing game: Tracing letters with finger is a skill that they can then translated to a pen or pencil when the time comes.

Enjoy and Learn ABC anywhere

Highlighted features of this kids education game:
• Accompanying images and a choice of colors to paint with,
• Tracing letters is separated into easy steps accompanied by bright arrows and our unique big green and red circles signing where to begin and where to stop tracing.
• Interactive elements are a key part of the ABC for kids.
• Short animations to encourage them to progress further
• Large letters and kids education game like elements
• Tracing ABC of full screen sized letters for easy writing even on small display.
• All Capital and lowercase English alphabets.
• Tracing letters correctly is guaranteed by especially developed algorithm.
• Professional voiceover assistant
• Support for 7 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and Dutch.
